Class ProjectFiles

java.lang.Object
ProjectFiles
public class ProjectFiles extends Object
EditProjectFiles serves the purpose of editing all the the text files made by all the other objects

      public ProjectFiles()

  • Method Details

    • editCustArchContr

      public static void editCustArchContr()
      This function serves the purpose of editing the customer,architect and contracter text files

      Process for each text file would be to read the txt file and store it and convert it to an array then prompted with which item they would like to edit. It would then be edited, converted to the needed format and then written back into the txt file.

    • textToList

      public static void textToList()
      This method serves the purpose of converting the text file project.txt to a ArrayList item

      The process in this method is that the text file is read and stored and then converted to the ArrayList item.

    • editListProject

      public static void editListProject()
      This function serves the purpose of editing the project text file as well as viewing the amount of past due projects

      The process of editing the project is it prompts the user with which project they would like to edit. It will then get the chosen project by the project name by checking which item in the Arraylist containing the projects contain the name and this project will be stored in an array with each item separated. The user is then prompted with which item they would like to edit then the next steps are taken in conditional statements. Every conditional edits an item except that of the past due dates which will check the dates and print the past due projects.

      By the end of method the edited project replaces the old one in the ArrayList and then Writes the new information to the text file.

    • finish

      public static void finish()
      The purpose of the method is to Finalize a project or view which projects are finalized.

      If the user wants to view completed projects the method will first check which projects contains the word done and then print all those projects if requested.

      If the user wants to finalize a project they will be asked which project to finalize by typing in the choice of projects name as shown and then the program will find that project with the project name given and then edit it to mark the needed item in the project to be equal to done.

      The final part of the method is that it checks wether the price payed is complete by the customer and if it is it will continue to get the customers contact details from the customer txt file and checking if the name corresponds with the chosen project then creating a text file unique to that customer with an invoice.
